attributes.review: I had very high hopes for this app because President Donald Trump is my lord and savior but it was the worst!! First, I waited almost 2 years for it to download. When it finally did, Trump himself jumped out of the screen, called me fat and ugly, and then proceeded to steal everything from my home. Now I live in an empty house and I have to sleep on the ground with the rats!!!! Even worse, as he was leaving he grabbed all my stuffed animals, stomped on them, and ate them. After all of that, he had the audacity to spray paint my whole house orange bc he “was insecure about being the only huge orange thing around.” After he left I opened the app again only to see that it hacked my whole phone!!! Now the only thing my phone does is say racist/homophobic/sexist/Islamophobic words and yell at people for wearing masks!!!
attributes.title: Disgusting 0/10

attributes.review: I thought that my perspective might have been a little shallow so I got this app to shed some light but all it did was TERRIFY me. Let me go into some detail- the second I got this my tv turned on and I thought that might have been someone else in my house but I checked and they were all asleep. I went to turn it off but it started BLARING “make America great again” and I just about pooped myself in fear. I’m shaking just writing this I hope to GOD you guys don’t get this I feel like I was cursed. You might think I’m being dramatic but I swear my family WOULDNT WAKE UP. I took a video and was gonna post it because I thought it could wake some mindless people up but it was WIPED the next day. Please pray for me I don’t want to be cursed for eternal damnation it was scarier in person
attributes.title: I feel like I opened a portal to hell

attributes.review: The UI is completely unintelligible, it took DAYS to download, I get an ad (and yes I did time this using an atomic clock) every .08 nanoseconds. It also botched the Coronavirus situation so badly that we’re stuck for much longer than the rest of the world, shut down the government in a hissy fit, has threatened the education department MULTIPLE TIMES, locked children away from their parents in concentration camps with no regard for human rights, violated the first amendment rights of peaceful protestors to take a photo of itself holding the in front of a church it doesn’t go to, given racists and bigots and crazy conspiracy theorists more credibility than they ever should have, and generally been a hateful, spiteful, and arrogant excuse of an app who’s still only trying to feel young as its dementia starts to kick in.
attributes.title: Jesus Christ, this app is awful

attributes.review:
I was curious about this app as so many Karens seem to love it. I’ve heard all my neighborhood Karens talking about this Trump app being amazing...so I decided to check it out, not even seconds into opening this app, I was extremely disappointed and offended by the layout of such app. First off Trump asked me for my phone number to “text me” “updates” and I was shook because he already has a wife. The app gave off racist, homophobic, narcissistic, creepy vibes. I ran a vibe check by popular demand. After thorough investigation on this app, the Trump app did not pass the vibe check, in fact, this app failed the vibe check so much that it was the lowest score I’ve seen in a vibe check in history.
The app also made my phone crash 666 times so do what you will with that information.
attributes.title: VIBE CHECK: NOT PASSED

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! first of all, it took so long to even get my phone to start working after i downloaded it. my phone kept powering itself off like every 2 minutes. nothing would fix it and it got to the point that i had to go to the apple store and buy a whole new phone. that is ridiculous. you would think for a president of the united states, there would be a better app than this. i’m very disappointed. secondly, once i deleted the app, it would not go off of my home screen. now i have this trash app just sitting on my phone, taking up storage, and i don’t even want to use it because it broke my first phone. i don’t have time to write any more, but believe me, there were plenty more bad things about this app. do not download.
attributes.title: she like papi i adore u😈😉😘✨

attributes.review: I’ve never been more disappointed in a president since Andrew Jackson!!!.This Oompa Loompa bullheaded orange shrimp junk shell of a man has completely wrecked my experience as an American teenager. Not only has he made this country worse but his presidency has brought my self esteem down and my “pride” as being an American teen. He’s a racist buffoon who is lacking grammar skills, even my six-year-old sister can spell better than him. I don’t know how he’s able to run a country when he can’t even control his own family. I swear to all that is holy if this man gets reinstated I will go back to Africa better yet I don’t know...I’ll do anything to not let this man be president. I’ll start rebellion/movement  if I must I can’t be in this country for another four years as him being president. Amen!!!
attributes.title: Lemme kms real quick

attributes.review: this is not a well made app at all! as soon as i opened it i was met with a “hot girls in your area” ad and ofc i clicked on it being the curious person i am and it was a sex tape of our president and an underage girl! can you believe that?! it was quite frightening but i kept the app bc i was looking for games but there were no games which made me really sad. the app actually hacked into my venmo and stole $5 every hour and explained itself in the permissions saying it was “needed for the campaign” (???) trump is a billionaire so i kinda just brushed it off and deleted my venmo but then the CRAZIEST thing happened. once i plugged in my phone to charge while i was using the app the charging cord literally grabbed my vagina! thats when i knew i had to delete it 😖 do not download the trump 2020 app
attributes.title: many bugs and glitches!

attributes.review:
The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!… Start. ding﻿

this app is so boring, the colors make me sick, and trump just lacks everything. also red, white, and blue were never a cute pattern 🙄 i think he should’ve made everything black and yellow while having the song black and yellow by wiz khalifa playing on the app. trump also looks like a cheeto um- i rather have an actual cheeto app than this orange creature 🍊 i do love me some hot cheetos 😩 never trump the cheeto doe. that’s just nasty. omg and please free barron we all know he hates his dad, his wife doesn’t even like him with her “hElLo 😁” self. anyways take down this app because it’s simply just a waste of space like trump -oopsie did i make it sound like i wanted trump to die ?? well i guess you’ll never know, don’t be such a snowflake ❄️ you probably just took it out of context 😹
xoxo
- your fav bernie supporter 💋
attributes.title: vote trump out of office ❤️

attributes.review: when I opened the app I saw a loading page that said “make America great again” I’ll like to say when was America great.... I’ll wait for people to get furious explaining how 😢🙈 then I was greeted with a picture of what seems to be a abnormally orange 🍊 and OBESE man , way to show how we’re #1 on obese rates I’ll say 😹🤰🏽I was very uncomfortable of how it seems he is sweating in such large amounts 😱S C A R Y😱 I heard he had a bad habit of eating a lot of McDonalds on a DAILY lots of calories ugh , he do be rather LARGE 😅🧐 I just don’t understand how such a human can have so many fans with him talking as if he had three brain cells matter a fact I lose some while listening to him 🌝 BUTTT I’d like to say , #FREEBARRON2020 😸😪 Trump has him under his control WE MUST FREE THE GIANT 😰, that is all thanks for tuning in 👁👅👁🦻🏽 THIS APP SIMPLY DESERVES A ZERO 🤢.
attributes.title: NO BUENO 😰 ITS A NO FOR ME ❤️
